item.title: Anyone got a good master command that lets stats go to 135
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

[quote=“LeScape Pk, post:4, topic:78194”]oops forgot to post my code lmao, here it is

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(486000000, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(486000000, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);
addSkillXP(486000000, 8);
addSkillXP(486000000, 9);
addSkillXP(486000000, 10);
addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
addSkillXP(486000000, 12);
addSkillXP(486000000, 13);
addSkillXP(486000000, 14);
addSkillXP(486000000, 15);
addSkillXP(486000000, 16);
addSkillXP(486000000, 17);
addSkillXP(486000000, 18);
addSkillXP(486000000, 19);
addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“If You Die Like This…Just Quit, Agreed?”);
}[/quote]

It would be " == 3) { on playerRights , not >=3) { " because there’s no spot higher than owner…

Here’s mine if ya want…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights == 3) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSummonXP(886000000); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("If You Die Like This...Just Quit, Agreed?"); }

item.title: Anyone got a good master command that lets stats go to 135
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && (playerRights >= 2)) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSummonXP(886000000); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("YOU BE MAXED OUT LIKE A BITCH!!! (go own some noobs)."); }
This is taken right off my server (pimpscape).
Just change

playerRights >= 2

to whatever you want
0 = regular player 1 = mod 2 = admin 3 = staff

item.title: Anyone got a good master command that lets stats go to 135
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

change playerRights >= 3) to w\e u want, 0 = anyone, 1 = mod, 2 = admin, 3 = owner
change the sendMessage(" to whatever you want it to say when they enter the command
find an already existing command, put the blinking | thing before everything else in the line
hit enter, hit ctrl+v
save
compile
all set
